snippet: Darius Reynaud, who will step in for the injured Josh Cribbs has returned three kicks for touchdowns during his five-year career.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Jets sign returner Darius Reynaud and place Josh Cribbs on injured reserve with a shoulder injury; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Darius Reynaud, who will step in for the injured Josh Cribbs has returned three kicks for touchdowns during his five-year career.

headline.main: Cribbs Is Put on Injured Reserve
headline.print_headline: Cribbs Is Put on Injured Reserve
